channel.title: Merchanting Helper
channel.description:
[b]Well have you ever been merchanting and using an autotalker when someone comes and offers you a large ammount eg 2315413 of what your buying but your buying them for 132coins ea so you start to panic because you want to buy it but you dont know how much to put....well then this is the script for you!! I have added my autotalker and calculator together so that when you press f9 a calculator comes up and it stops talking then when you close it it continues to talk!!!its my longest script yet with over 534 lines so i would appreciate it if you could post any bugs (press f10 to stop script)[/b]
REQUIREMENTS - Scar divi 3.12c - SRL 4.00 - A runescape account
CREDITS - Nashi for help with the script allround - Ron for his form parser - Freddy1990 for making scar - Ppl who made SRL [font=Verdana][size=40pt]SCRIPT IS ATTACHED!!!![/size][/font]

item.title: Merchanting Helper
item.dc:creator: @sonny_bill_9 ``jason
item.description:
@sonny_bill_9 wrote:

Well have you ever been merchanting and using an autotalker when someone comes and offers you a large ammount eg 2315413 of what your buying but your buying them for 132coins ea so you start to panic because you want to buy it but you dont know how much to put…well then this is the script for you!! I have added my autotalker and calculator together so that when you press f9 a calculator comes up and it stops talking then when you close it it continues to talk!!!its my longest script yet with over 534 lines so i would appreciate it if you could post any bugs (press f10 to stop script)

REQUIREMENTS

  • Scar divi 3.12c
  • SRL 4.00
  • A runescape account

CREDITS

  • Nashi for help with the script allround
  • Ron for his form parser
  • Freddy1990 for making scar
